title: worktree-merge: MergeManager changes
description:
Update MergeManager to use parent branch and support MergeOptions

## Context

**Spec:** `docs/projects/2026-01-24-worktree-merge/2026-01-24-worktree-merge-spec.md`
**GitHub Issue:** #4

**Key files for this epic:**
- `internal/worktree/merge.go` - MergeManager implementation
- `internal/worktree/merge_test.go` - Existing tests to extend

**Changes:**
1. Add MergeOptions struct
2. Add ErrParentBranchNotFound and ErrNoTargetBranch errors
3. Add TargetBranch field to MergeResult
4. Update Merge() signature to accept MergeOptions
5. Implement target branch resolution logic
